title: VanEck Temporarily Cuts Bitcoin ETF Fee to Zero After Lagging in Assets
description: HODL, VanEck’s spot bitcoin exchange-traded fund (ETF), has so far attracted a little over $305 million in assets, which is far below most of its competitors.

title: ‘Ready Player One’ Metaverse Shares First Look at Battle Royale Game

title: Why Analysts Are Bullish on the Ethereum Dencun Upgrade

title: Ripple (XRP) breaks out from 6-year bullish chart pattern
description: When $XRP formed a top very early in January 2018, a strong community who held the $XRP tokens were probably euphoric. Six years later, with the price having gone down and down, $XRP has finally broken out of a 6-year chart pattern. Will $XRP now explode? How far can it go?

title: Bitcoin has outpaced USD nearly every year since its inception
description: Since its inception, Bitcoin has experienced annual price declines in only four of 14 years.
